means: 彬彬有礼的，温文尔雅的

sentence.Network_en: She describes him as urbane and charming.
He tried hard to be urbane.
sentence.Network_cn: 他极力作出彬彬有礼的神态.

sentence.Network_en: In conversation, he was suave and urbane.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'urban'): from French urbain or Latin urbanus (see urban)

entry.def: Someone who is urbane is polite and appears comfortable in social situations.

example.ex: She describes him as urbane and charming...
In conversation, he was suave and urbane.

means.word_mean: 1. showing a high degree of refinement and the assurance that comes from wide social experience;

sentences.sentence: "maintained an urbane tone in his letters"

means.word_mean: 3. marked by wide-ranging knowledge and appreciation of many parts of the world arising from urban life and wide travel;

sentences.sentence: "the sophisticated manners of a true cosmopolite"
"urbane and pliant...he was at ease even in the drawing rooms of Paris"

auth_sentence.content: Then the urbane Frenchman politely brushed the question aside.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then the urbane Frenchman politely brushed the question aside.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then the urbane Frenchman politely brushed the question aside.

auth_sentence.content: Raising...savage life To rustic, and the rustic to urbane.
auth_sentence.res_content: Raising...savage life To rustic, and the rustic to urbane.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Raising...savage life To rustic, and the rustic to urbane.

auth_sentence.content: I grew up in London, the child of urbane, educated artists.
auth_sentence.res_content: I grew up in London, the child of urbane, educated artists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I grew up in London, the child of urbane, educated artists.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+urban[adj.城市的, 市内的]→adj.城市远郊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 粗野的, 粗鄙的, 无理的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+urbane[adj.温文尔雅的,懂礼的]→adj.粗野的, 粗鄙的, 无理的
urb城市+an表示地方→adj.城市的, 市内的
urbane[adj.温文尔雅的,懂礼的]+ity表名词→n.有礼貌, 文雅
sub下面+urb城市→在城市下面→郊区

means.word_mean: 彬彬有礼的;温文尔雅的

sentences.en: He tried hard to be urbane.
sentences.cn: 他极力作出彬彬有礼的神态。
